RuleSet.Name: src/schema/ISchemaTable.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java interface for a $TableName$ record implementation

GenFile.Name: fileISchemaTableJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$

RuleSet.GenRule: public $implJavaAtomType$ get$implColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$(); public void set$implColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$( $implJavaAtomType$ $lower implColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$ );
public $implJavaAtomType$ get$implColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$(); public void set$implColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$( $implJavaAtomType$ $lower implColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$ );
public $implJavaAtomType$ get$implColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$(); public void set$implColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$( $implJavaAtomType$ $lower implColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$ );
$switch HasSuperClassRelation no maybeDeclRecOptAuditColumnAttrAccessors default empty$$iterate Columns( each maybeDeclSchemaRecTableRecDataColumn )$
$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( lone IsNullable first IsNullable each empty empty no )$
public $declJavaAtomType$ get$declColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$(); public void set$declColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$( $declJavaAtomType$ $lower declColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$ );
public $declJavaAtomType$ get$declColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$(); public void set$declColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$( $declJavaAtomType$ $lower declColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$ );
public $declJavaAtomType$ get$declColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$(); public void set$declColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$( $declJavaAtomType$ $lower declColumnAttrOptionality$$Name$ );
$switch HasAuditColumns yes declAuditColumnInitValues default empty$$iterate Columns( each maybeDeclInitValue empty empty )$

extends I$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable DefSchemaName$$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable TableName$
//@Override not necessary because interfaces aren't able to implement Comparable, but they can double-team on the requirement public int compareTo( Object obj );

public void set( I$reference BaseClass DefSchemaName$$reference BaseClass TableName$ src ); public void set$TableName$( I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$ src );$switch BaseHasHistory yes declRecSetHistory default empty$
